body: Leonardo Sakamoto  refutes [pt] the  statement of the foreign affairs adviser to  the  Brazilian presidency, Marco Aurelio Garcia, that  "A  neo-colonial relationship  is  only established if neo-colonizer and  colonized  are in agreement." For him, it is  necessary  to examine the complicity of  local  elites and the situation of colonized countries instead.
original_body: Leonardo Sakamoto refutes [pt] the statement of the foreign affairs adviser to the Brazilian presidency, Marco Aurelio Garcia, that "A neo-colonial relationship is only established if neo-colonizer and colonized are in agreement." For him, it is necessary to examine the complicity of local elites and the situation of colonized countries instead.
title: Brazil: Neo-Colonialism in Africa
